trans-unit.source: The JDBC connection and transaction model

seg-source.mrk: The JDBC connection and transaction model

target.mrk: The JDBC connection and transaction model

trans-unit.source: Session and transaction capabilities for SQL are handled through JDBC routines, not by SQL commands.

seg-source.mrk: Session and transaction capabilities for SQL are handled through JDBC routines, not by SQL commands.

target.mrk: Session and transaction capabilities for SQL are handled through JDBC routines, not by SQL commands.

trans-unit.source: JDBC defines a system session and transaction model for database access. A session is the duration of one connection to the database and is handled by a JDBC Connection object.

seg-source.mrk: JDBC defines a system session and transaction model for database access.
A session is the duration of one connection to the database and is handled by a JDBC Connection object.

target.mrk: JDBC defines a system session and transaction model for database access.
A session is the duration of one connection to the database and is handled by a JDBC Connection object.
